languages.text: "Мы никогда не забудем вашего великодушия, Лорд-капитан! Отплатим верностью и своими жизнями, если понадобится".

traits.locale_text: "Мы никогда не забудем вашего великодушия, Лорд-капитан! Отплатим верностью и своими жизнями, если понадобится".

languages.text: "We will never forget your generosity, Lord Captain! We will repay your loyalty with our lives if need be."
languages.original_text: "Мы никогда не забудем вашего великодушия, Лорд-капитан! Отплатим верностью и своими жизнями, если понадобится".

traits.locale_text: "We will never forget your generosity, Lord Captain! We will repay your loyalty with our lives if need be."
"We will never forget your generosity, Lord Captain! We will repay your loyalty with our lives if need be."
"We will never forget your generosity, Lord Captain! We will repay your loyalty with our lives if need be."
"We will never forget your generosity, Lord Captain! We will repay your loyalty with our lives if need be."
"We will never forget your generosity, Lord Captain! We will repay your loyalty with our lives if need be."
"We will never forget your generosity, Lord Captain! We will repay your loyalty with our lives if need be."

languages.text: «¡Jamás olvidaremos su generosidad, Lord Capitán! Pagaremos su lealtad con nuestras vidas si fuese menester».
languages.original_text: "We will never forget your generosity, Lord Captain! We will repay your loyalty with our lives if need be."

traits.locale_text: «¡Jamás olvidaremos su generosidad, Lord Capitán! Pagaremos su lealtad con nuestras vidas si fuese menester».

languages.text: 「あなたの寛大さは決して忘れません、ロード・キャプテン！必要であればあなたの忠誠に恩返しするために、命をかけましょう」
languages.original_text: "We will never forget your generosity, Lord Captain! We will repay your loyalty with our lives if need be."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの寛大さは決して忘れません、ロード・キャプテン！必要であればあなたの忠誠に恩返しするために、命をかけましょう」

languages.text: “我们永远不会忘记您的慷慨，舰长大人！如果需要的话，我们会用生命来报答您的仁慈。”
languages.original_text: "We will never forget your generosity, Lord Captain! We will repay your loyalty with our lives if need be."

traits.locale_text: “我们永远不会忘记您的慷慨，舰长大人！如果需要的话，我们会用生命来报答您的仁慈。”

languages.text: "Wir werden Eure Großzügigkeit nie vergessen, Lord Captain! Wir werden Eure Loyalität falls nötig mit unserem Leben vergelten."
languages.original_text: "We will never forget your generosity, Lord Captain! We will repay your loyalty with our lives if need be."

traits.locale_text: "Wir werden Eure Großzügigkeit nie vergessen, Lord Captain! Wir werden Eure Loyalität falls nötig mit unserem Leben vergelten."

languages.text: « Nous n'oublierons jamais votre générosité, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! S'il le faut, nous n'hésiterons pas à donner nos vies pour rembourser notre dette. »
languages.original_text: "We will never forget your generosity, Lord Captain! We will repay your loyalty with our lives if need be."

traits.locale_text: « Nous n'oublierons jamais votre générosité, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! S'il le faut, nous n'hésiterons pas à donner nos vies pour rembourser notre dette. »

languages.text: "Cömertliğinizi asla unutmayacağız Lord Kaptan! Sadakatinizin karşılığını gerekirse canımızı vererek ödeyeceğiz."
languages.original_text: "We will never forget your generosity, Lord Captain! We will repay your loyalty with our lives if need be."
